explains: n. 重新安置；再布置；变换布置

sentences.en: The company says the cost of relocation will be negligible.
sentences.cn: 公司说迁移的费用微不足道。

sentences.en: Relocation expenses were paid to encourage senior staff to move to the region.
sentences.cn: 支付搬迁费是为了鼓励资深职员搬到那个地区去。

sentences.en: Travel and social security plus relocation expenses are paid.
sentences.cn: 差旅费，社会保险，再加上搬迁费都支付了。
